articles.title: Freight, trucking industry 'causing problems' by not employing locals - Zikalala - News24
articles.description: "We will also be engaging the freight and logistic industry. It is them who are causing problems. If they prioritise South Africans and employ people who are local, that will help us to resolve this problem," KwaZulu-Natal Premier Sihle Zikalala has said.
articles.content:
• Sihle Zikalala says the freight and trucking industry are "causing problems" by not prioritising SA truck drivers over foreign nationals.

articles.title: Oldest human fossils in East Africa are even older than we thought - Business Insider
articles.description: The bones of ancient Homo sapiens, unearthed in Ethiopia, were buried beneath a layer of volcanic ash. A new clue helped scientists date the fossils.
articles.content:
Eastern Africa's oldest human fossils are even more ancient than researchers thought, a new study suggests.
The Omo I fossils are a set of Homo sapiens bones unearthed in the late 1960s, deep in Eth… [+3359 chars]
